main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Springfield, Ohio, on March 27, 1965, and was seen moving in an erratic manner.
interesting points: The object appeared as a luminescent light moving at high speed and altitude,The sighting lasted between 5-10 minutes,The object stopped and hovered before moving erratically again,There were no other objects reported in the vicinity,The observer described it as a solid object that seemed bright but did not resemble a star or planet.
sighted object: a luminous, indistinct object in the sky
witness description: The witness, a civilian, reported observing the object with children, who were initially scared but later excited.
